@devanbeitel_ @Netlify If you have a user who is a member of both teams, they can transfer ownership from one to the other (they don't need to remain a member of both teams). Otherwise I expect that the support team could help make it happen for you if you messaged them via https://t.co/OvxQSpHjpG
